    • add

      public void add​(NounName nounName, int line, int column) throws java.io.IOException
      Add a noun with the values of the parameters of the method in the nounList
      Parameters:
      nounName - The nounName field of the noun we are going to add in the nounList
      line - The line field of the noun we are going to add in the nounList
      column - The column field of the noun we are going to add in the nounList
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException

    • remove

      public boolean remove​(int line, int column)
      Remove a noun that has coordinates (line, column) in the nounList if it exists
      Parameters:
      line - The value of the noun's line we are looking for
      column - The value of the noun's column we are looking for
      Returns:
      True if a noun has been removed, otherwise false

    • getNounAtCoordinates

      public Noun getNounAtCoordinates​(int line, int column)
      Return the noun at the coordinates (line, column) if it exists
      Parameters:
      line - The value of the noun's line we are looking for
      column - The value of the noun's column we are looking for
      Returns:
      The noun we were looking for, null if it's not in the list

    • drawNounList

      public void drawNounList​(fr.umlv.zen5.ApplicationContext context, float cellSize, float horizontalPadding, float verticalPadding)
      Draw all the noun in nounList
      Parameters:
      context - ApplicationContext
      cellSize - Size of a noun
      horizontalPadding - Space we add horizontally to center the screen
      verticalPadding - Space we add vertically to center the screen

      Take all of the noun's coordinates in this.nounList, and implements them in the nounList in parameters
